aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Shahvaiz Ahmed
aboutData.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer
aboutData.text: I am a proficient Full Stack Web Developer specializing in Django Python and React JS. My expertise lies in crafting dynamic and responsive web applications. I am dedicated to designing and developing seamless user experiences, from the back-end logic to the front-end interactivity. With a passion for clean code and innovative solutions, I strive to create impactful online experiences that engage, inspire, and leave a lasting impression.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.text: I specialize in crafting immersive digital experiences through frontend web development. With a keen eye for design and expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I bring websites to life by seamlessly blending aesthetics and functionality.

services.title: Backend Development
services.text: I specialize in backend web development, crafting the unseen systems that power websites and applications. From designing databases to handling server logic, I ensure seamless functionality and robust performance to create exceptional user experiences.

services.title: React Js Development
services.text: I specialize in React.js development, crafting interactive and dynamic user interfaces. With a strong foundation in JavaScript and modern web technologies, I create seamless user experiences that bring ideas to life.

services.title: Python Django Development
services.text: I specialize in Python Django development, crafting robust web solutions with elegant code architecture. From building dynamic backends to ensuring seamless integration, I thrive in creating tailored experiences that meet both functional and aesthetic demands.

services.title: FullStack Development
services.text: I specialize in FullStack Web development, seamlessly bridging the gap between front-end and back-end. Crafting interactive user experiences on the surface while optimizing performance and functionality underneath is where my expertise truly shines.

services.title: APIs
services.text: I specialize in crafting robust APIs that seamlessly connect and communicate between different software applications. With a deep understanding of various programming languages and frameworks, I ensure efficient data exchange and integration, driving enhanced user experiences and system interoperability.

skillData.title: All the skills that I have in that field of work are mentioned.
skillData.text: My skill set includes a strong command of HTML, CSS/Bootstrap/MUI, JavaScript, React JS, Python, and Django/Django Rest Framework, enabling me to create exceptional web experiences with precision and efficiency.

portfolioItems.title: E-Comerce
portfolioItems.subTitle: Integrated with Microsoft Business Central Dynamics 365

portfolioItems.title: Ukraine Risk Map
portfolioItems.subTitle: A one-page solution for showing the risk map of the current war situation in Ukraine. The product was demanded by Inherent Risks. Google map APIs are used to show the war zone via drawing a KML layer over the map. The search function is also designed for the user to search for his desired area and he can then check the risk ratio of that area.
